body:
Without naming any names, I believe that in many cases which I have witnessed, if it is getting towards the end of a nexus match some donors will leave and join the team that is winning. Even though winning doesn't make you any better I feel that they do this just to make themselves look really good and so that they can think and feel that they are better than anyone else.

What's your opinion?
body_tagged:

Even though winning doesn't make you any better I feel that they do this just to make themselves look really good and so that they can think and feel that they are better than anyone else.

What's your opinion?
title: Cheating Donors

Sure, it's cheap but it's not really that big of a deal. It doesn't really heavily affect gameplay, it just kinda makes em look like a nub. It's only like 8 XP.
